OrgName.entry: ROTHER VALLEY COUNTRY PARK WATERSPORTS CENTRE

Desc.entry: A 750 acre country park providing activities on land and water for all ages and abilities. Activities include zorbing, canoeing, windsurfing, sailing and rafting. Other activities that can be booked through the Watersports centre include archery, cycle hire, team building and corporate activities. Instruction by fully qualified staff licensed to instruct people aged 18 years and below in activities. British Canoe Union approved and affiliated to the Royal Yachting Association. Holiday programmes are available with Watersports and Holiday HQ. Has a staffed play area. A miniature train operates on fine weather days on a seven and a quarter width track with a 800m route.

DisabledAccess.entry: Specially equipped changing and shower area

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Sun 8.30am-dusk (Park opening hours), Mon-Sun 10am-6pm (Summer, Watersports Centre), 10am-3.30pm (Winter, Watersports Centre)
